name: Filenesia
startIntroPart2: A revolutionary desktop brimming with ideas, a melting-pot of ideologies only united by their stand against the influences of the world
introduction: Greetings- we're honoured to meet you.
declaringWar: We will not back down or ever surrender to you!
attacked: Your bytes will be crushed under the combined force of our troops!
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: We accept your peace offer, long live our unity.
tradeRequest: We am not always this generous, but we hope you take this rare opportunity we give you.
